actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize road repair or reconstruction at Fort Gibson Lake, Oklahoma.

summary.text: Modifies the Fort Gibson Lake project, Oklahoma, authorized by the Flood Control Act of 1941, to direct the Secretary of the Army to plan, design, and construct repairs to Whitehorn and Toppers roads to reasonable standards, if: (1) such standards meet the minimum standards required by the affected county; and (2) the non-Federal interests agree to operate and maintain such facilities at their own expense.

titles.title: A bill to authorize road repair or reconstruction at Fort Gibson Lake, Oklahoma.
